sections.heading: High-wage jobs tax credit; qualifying high-wage jobs.Section 7-9G-2 - Repealed.
Repealed.
sections.text:
History:Laws 2007, ch. 229, § 1; 2009, ch. 279, § 3; repealed by Laws 2023, ch. 85, § 28.

Repeals.— Laws 2023, ch. 85, § 28 repealed 7-9G-2 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 2007, ch. 229, § 1, relating to advanced energy combined reporting tax credit, gross receipts tax, compensating tax, withholding tax, effective July 1, 2023. For provisions of former section,seethe 2022 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.
